english.segment1: Missing you like crazy. I feel a million miles away. A part of me is empty. That noone could replace. So i'll run to you. Despite the shame. I'll leave it all behind
english.segment2: On my way home. On my way home. I'm running back to you. On my way home. On my way home. I'm running back to you
english.segment3: How could you ever love me. When I didn't love myself. When my broken (ness?) consumed me. Everyone just walked away. You took me by the hand. I'm nothing without you
english.segment4: On my way home. On my way home. I'm running back to you. On my way home. On my way home. I'm running back to you
english.segment5: And all those years. Without you here. ?? with so much pain. And on my own. I tried to change. I'm simply lost without you
english.segment6: I'm tearing down the walls. The walls that kept me in for so long. I'm tearing down the walls
english.segment7: On my way home. On my way home. I'm running back to you. On my way home. On my way home. I'm running back to you
english.segment8: On my way home. On my way home. I'm running back to you. On my way home. On my way home. I'm running back to you.
